text: Krk (; ; ) is an Adriatic island in Croatia. It is near Rijeka in the Bay of Kvarner and part of Primorje-Gorski Kotar County. Krk is together with Cres as the largest Adriatic island. It is mostly rocky. Krk is the name of the main settlement of the island. == References == Category:Islands of Croatia Category:Primorje-Gorski Kotar County
title: Krk
